MAILDISTSETTING_SEARCH_WHERE.Statement: WHERE w2_MailDistSetting.dept_id = @dept_id AND ( (@maildist_id_like_escaped = '' OR w2_MailDistSetting.maildist_id LIKE @maildist_id_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') -- ターゲットID AND (@maildist_name_like_escaped = '' OR w2_MailDistSetting.maildist_name LIKE '%' + @maildist_name_like_escaped + '%' ESCAPE '#') -- ターゲット名 ) AND w2_MailDistSetting.del_flg = '0'

MAILDISTSETTING_SEARCH_ORDER_BY.Statement: ORDER BY w2_MailDistSetting.date_created DESC, -- 常に一定の結果セットを得るため、主キー（昇順）ソート w2_MailDistSetting.dept_id ASC, w2_MailDistSetting.maildist_id ASC
